trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> types containing data items to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

The data item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent to this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TreeItem"></xref> in all cases.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string containing the value `TreeViewItem`.
Gets the control pattern for the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A> method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`:
The value of `patternInterface`
The return value
The current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer> that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> that contains the data item
The current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer>.
The current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer>.
An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
The type of pattern implemented by the element to retrieve.
The object that implements the pattern interface, or `null` if the specified pattern interface is not implemented by this peer.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent to this automation peer.
The parent automation peer.
Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The state, expanded or collapsed, of the control.
Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
UI Automation element is no longer available.
Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
`true` if an item is selected; otherwise, `false`.
Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
UI Automation element is no longer available.
Clears any selection and then selects the current element.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
UI Automation element is no longer available.
Gets the UI automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider"></xref> and acts as the container for the calling object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
The UI automation provider.
